Rulings.Edison:
●This effect activates at the end of the Damage Step and starts a Chain. If a monster’s ATK is reduced by “Rocket Pilder” and then is affected by “Shrink,” the ATK of the monster becomes half of the original ATK.
●If “Rocket Pilder” is negated after it reduces a monster’s ATK, that monster’s ATK does not go back to normal.
●If “Rocket Pilder” is destroyed after it reduces a monster’s ATK, that monster’s ATK does not go back to normal.
●Even if the equipped monster destroys its attack target, “Rocket Pilder’s” effect starts a Chain.

Rulings.Base:
1. This effect activates at the end of the Damage Step and starts a Chain.
2. If a monster's ATK is reduced by "Rocket Pilder" and then is affected by "Shrink", the ATK of the monster becomes half of the original ATK.

This ruling is outdated: (The effect of Pilder will be recalculated with the new halved original ATK. Source: Perfect Rulebook 2017 Shrink vs Rush Recklessly.)
3. If "Rocket Pilder" is negated after it reduces a monster's ATK, that monster's ATK does not go back to normal.
4. If "Rocket Pilder" is destroyed after it reduces a monster's ATK, that monster's ATK does not go back to normal.
5. Even if the equipped monster destroys its attack target, the effect of "Rocket Pilder" starts a Chain.
